creator: sidney.rocha@gmail.com
text:
Version: httpd-2.4.18-dev
Modules: mod_http2 and mod_ssl
In a .httaccess file, the "HTTPS" enviroment var is always 'off', even  if the request is done through secure connection.

creator: stefan@eissing.org
text: Fixed in /trunk with r1717958. Proposed for back porting to 2.4.x.

creator: stefan@eissing.org
text: Please check if 2.4.18 works for you.
